resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103406</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103406</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alternative discussion formats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alternative Diskussion Formate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formats alternatifs de discussion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formatos alternativos da discussão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formati alternativi di discussione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εναλλακτικές μορφές συζήτησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formatos alternativos de la discusión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Formal debates and question-and-answer discussions are great, but these alternative discussion formats will liven up your classroom and get students really thinking.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formale Debatten und Frage-Antwortdiskussionen 
sind groß, aber diese alternativen Diskussion Formate willen liven 
herauf Ihr Klassenzimmer und erhalten die wirklich denkenden 
Kursteilnehmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les discussions formelles et les discussions de 
questions et réponses sont grandes, mais ces formats alternatifs de 
discussion veulent liven vers le haut de votre salle de classe et 
obtiennent des étudiants pensant vraiment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os debates formais e as discussões 
question-and-answer são grandes, mas estes formatos alternativos da 
discussão querem liven acima de sua sala de aula e começam os 
estudantes que pensam realmente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I dibattiti convenzionali e le discussioni di 
domande e risposte sono grandi, ma questi formati alternativi di 
discussione vogliono liven sulla vostra aula ed ottengono gli allievi 
realmente che pensano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι επίσημες διαμάχες και οι ερώτησης και απάντησης 
συζητήσεις είναι μεγάλες, αλλά αυτές οι εναλλακτικές μορφές 
συζήτησης επάνω η τάξη σας και παίρνουν τους σπουδαστές 
πραγματικά σκεπτόμενους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los discusiones formales y las discusiones 
question-and-answer son grandes, pero estos formatos alternativos de 
la discusión quieren liven encima de su sala de clase y consiguen a 
estudiantes realmente que piensan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHRYN WALBERT
FN:KATHRYN WALBERT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103406</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/alternative-discussion-formats</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
